moduleDescription: Mobile application security testing, APK analysis, reverse engineering aur OSINT techniques

content.intro: Mobile security ki basics - Android architecture, security model aur common vulnerabilities samajhna zaroori hai.

sections.heading: Android Security Architecture
sections.text:
Android Security Layers:

• Application Layer
  - App permissions
  - Code signing
  - Sandboxing

• Framework Layer
  - Android APIs
  - System services
  - IPC mechanisms

• Native Layer
  - Native libraries
  - Hardware abstraction
  - Kernel drivers

• Kernel Layer
  - Linux kernel
  - SELinux policies
  - Hardware security

sections.heading: Mobile Attack Vectors
sections.text:
Common Mobile Threats:

• Malicious Apps
• Data Leakage
• Insecure Communication
• Weak Authentication
• Insecure Data Storage
• Code Tampering
• Reverse Engineering
• Binary Attacks
• Runtime Manipulation
• Physical Device Access

commands.explanation: Android Debug Bridge tools install karta hai
Connected Android devices list karta hai

commands.command: adb shell settings put global development_settings_enabled 1
commands.explanation: Developer options enable karta hai
APK reverse engineering tool
Java decompiler for Android APK
DEX to JAR converter tool

content.intro: Android APK files ki detailed analysis - static analysis, dynamic analysis aur reverse engineering techniques.

sections.heading: APK Structure Analysis
sections.text:
APK File Components:

• AndroidManifest.xml - App permissions aur components
• classes.dex - Compiled Java code
• resources.arsc - App resources
• res/ - Images, layouts, strings
• lib/ - Native libraries
• assets/ - Additional files
• META-INF/ - Signing information

commands.explanation: APK basic information extract karta hai
APK file contents list karta hai
APK contents extract karta hai
APK ko human-readable format mein decompile karta hai
Manifest file mein permissions aur components analyze karta hai
APK ko Java source code mein convert karta hai

sections.heading: Security Analysis
sections.text:
Security Issues to Look For:

• Hardcoded Credentials
• API Keys in Code
• Insecure Data Storage
• Weak Encryption
• Debug Information
• Backup Flags
• Network Security Config
• Certificate Pinning
• Root Detection Bypass
• Anti-tampering Mechanisms

commands.explanation: Hardcoded credentials aur secrets search karta hai
Code mein embedded URLs find karta hai
Database files search karta hai

content.intro: Runtime mein app behavior analyze karna - debugging, hooking aur runtime manipulation techniques.

sections.heading: Frida Framework
sections.text:
Frida - Dynamic instrumentation toolkit:

• Runtime code injection
• Function hooking
• Memory manipulation
• API monitoring
• Bypass security controls
• Real-time analysis

commands.explanation: Frida dynamic analysis framework install karta hai
Android ke liye Frida server download karta hai

commands.command: adb push frida-server /data/local/tmp/ && adb shell chmod 755 /data/local/tmp/frida-server

sections.heading: Runtime Hooking

commands.explanation: Device mein running applications list karta hai
Target app mein Frida script inject karta hai
App spawn kar ke immediately hook karta hai

commands.command: adb shell settings put global http_proxy 192.168.1.100:8080
commands.explanation: Device mein HTTP proxy configure karta hai

commands.command: adb push burp_cert.crt /sdcard/ && adb shell am start -a android.credentials.INSTALL
commands.explanation: Burp Suite certificate device mein install karta hai
Mobile device traffic capture karta hai

commands.command: adb shell su -c 'dd if=/proc/$(pidof com.example.app)/mem of=/sdcard/memory_dump.bin'
commands.explanation: App memory dump create karta hai
Memory dump mein sensitive strings search karta hai
Application heap dump create karta hai

content.intro: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) - publicly available information se intelligence gathering techniques.

sections.heading: OSINT Methodology
sections.text:
OSINT Process:

1. Requirements Definition
   • Information needs
   • Target identification
   • Scope definition

2. Source Identification
   • Public databases
   • Social media
   • Government records
   • Technical sources

3. Data Collection
   • Automated tools
   • Manual research
   • API access
   • Web scraping

4. Analysis & Correlation
   • Data validation
   • Pattern recognition
   • Timeline creation
   • Relationship mapping

5. Reporting
   • Intelligence products
   • Actionable insights
   • Risk assessment

sections.heading: Search Engine Intelligence
sections.text:
Google Dorking Techniques:

• site:example.com - Specific site search
• filetype:pdf - File type search
• intitle:"admin panel" - Title search
• inurl:admin - URL search
• cache:example.com - Cached pages
• "exact phrase" - Exact match
• wildcard * search - Pattern matching
• daterange: - Time-based search
• related:example.com - Similar sites
• info:example.com - Site information

sections.heading: Social Media Intelligence
sections.text:
Social Media OSINT Sources:

• Facebook - Personal information, connections
• Twitter - Real-time updates, opinions
• LinkedIn - Professional information
• Instagram - Location data, lifestyle
• YouTube - Video content, comments
• TikTok - Trends, user behavior
• Reddit - Discussions, communities
• GitHub - Code repositories, projects

Data Points to Collect:
• Personal information
• Location data
• Social connections
• Interests and hobbies
• Work information
• Contact details
• Photos and metadata
• Timeline of activities

content.intro: Advanced Google search techniques - Google dorking, search operators aur information discovery methods.

sections.heading: Google Search Operators
sections.text:
Basic Search Operators:

• "exact phrase" - Exact match search
• site:example.com - Site-specific search
• filetype:pdf - File type search
• intitle:admin - Title search
• inurl:login - URL search
• intext:password - Body text search
• cache:example.com - Cached version
• related:example.com - Similar sites
• info:example.com - Site information
• define:cybersecurity - Definition search

Advanced Operators:
• wildcard * - Pattern matching
• OR operator - Alternative search
• - (minus) - Exclude terms
• .. (range) - Number ranges
• daterange: - Time-based search
• location: - Geographic search

sections.heading: Security-focused Dorks
sections.text:
Common Security Dorks:

• intitle:"index of" password
• filetype:sql "INSERT INTO"
• inurl:admin intitle:login
• "config.php" "database"
• filetype:log "password"
• intitle:"phpMyAdmin" "Welcome to phpMyAdmin"
• inurl:"/proc/self/cwd"
• filetype:env "DB_PASSWORD"
• "Server Status" "Apache Server Information"
• intitle:"Apache2 Ubuntu Default Page"

commands.explanation: Target site mein admin panels search karta hai
Configuration files search karta hai
Database files search karta hai
